item.title: 转录组原始数据处理流程
item.description: mm10 gtf gencode https://www.jianshu.com/p/a84cd44bac67 # 进行质控 nohup fastqc -t 4 ./.gz -o ./fastqc_results > ./fastqc.log 2>&1 & # 去除低质量的部分 nohup trim_galore –illumina -o clean raw/fastq/.gz & nohup trim_galore -q 25 –phred33 –fastqc –length

item.title: PCA绘图
item.description: 使用R语言进行PCA绘图1 构建绘图数据 data.matrix <- matrix(nrow=100, ncol=10) colnames(data.matrix) <- c( paste("wt", 1:5, sep=""), paste("ko", 1:5, sep="") ) rownames(data.matrix) <- c( paste("gene", 1:100, sep="") ) for (i in 1:100) { wt.values <- rpois(5, lambda=sample(x=10:1000, size=1)) ko.values <- rpois(5, lambda=sample(x=10:1000, size=1)) data.matrix[i,] <- c(wt.values, ko.values) } procomp默认样
